About

Founded in 2009, iFocus Media is an independent, dynamic Advertising Production with a passionate team in Saigon. We deliver a variety of TVC, Viral and Music video with full service of production. From ideas to post production, we communicate your message, we create emotions, and we bring your story to life."

Address

135 Tran Hung Dao, Cau Ong Lanh ward, district 1, HCMC
Contact

Mr. Nhut (+84) 938.393.090 nguyennhut@ifocusmedia.vn


Mr. Bone Ho (+84) 908.009.299 boneho@ifocusmedia.vn
